question: What are the names of projects that were completed before 2022?
raw_answer: Guardrail Replacement Citywide, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs
evidence_answer: Guardrail Replacement Citywide, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs
extracted_search_list: What are the names of projects that were completed before 2022?

Clover Heights Storm Drain (FEMA Project)

(cid:190) Project Description: This project consists of design and construction of a
few storm drain on Clover Heights.

(cid:190) Project Schedule: August 2020 through March 2021

Page 3 of 6

Agenda Item # 4.A.

The existing storm drain facility ends at
the intersection of Clover Heights and Harvester Road.

The project consists of hiring a consultant to develop
a plan that includes the evaluation of a siren system and possible locations.

An extended storm
drain towards the end of Clover Heights will help eliminate this issue.

However, it
is anticipated that this phase of the project will be completed at the
end of February 2021.
